page.title: 16THE MEDIA.
page.content: {Newspapers.} Local Newspaper - Tenbury Advertiser. Area also covered by Hereford Times, Shropshire Star and Worcester Berrows Journal. {Local Radio.} Wyvern Radio - formed in late 1970s. Shropshire Radio - formed in Spring 1986.{ {Parish Magazines }- The Sword- formed January 1973, a monthly magazine, edited, compiled and produced locally by volunteers and distributed to approximately 120 homes in the area. A similar magazine is delivered, free of charge, to every home in Bockleton, Leysters and Middleton on the Hill. Both of these cover details of Church Services, local events, W.I. and other reports, and any other local news.
